positions.title: Software Engineer Intern
positions.description_html:
‚Ä¢ ‚Äã‚ÄãConducted comprehensive requirement-gathering by understanding the primary concerns of stakeholders, resulting in the development of a tailored DataHub model.
‚Ä¢ Set up Docker environments for testing and deployment.
‚Ä¢ Authored Python scripts compliant with industry standards, employing libraries like Pydantic for custom data validation. Ensured "pythonic" coding practices, emphasizing clean and efficient code.
‚Ä¢ Integrated DataHub with Sapient's existing code repositories, ensuring scalability and seamless metadata ingestion.
‚Ä¢ Utilized SOLID principles in software design for code flexibility and adaptability.
‚Ä¢ Gained hands-on UI/UX experience using Figma, designing web pages with an emphasis on user-centric data visualizations.
‚Ä¢ Collaborated across various departments, enhancing cross-functional communication and team coordination.

experience.title: Technical Lead
experience.description: As the Tech Lead, I have overseen our web development projects primarily utilizing the Django framework as part of our tech stack. Leveraging PostgreSQL for our database needs, I've successfully spearheaded the creation of a Progressive Web App (PWA) to enhance mobile user experience.

experience.title: Associate Product Manager
experience.description: As an Associate Product Manager, I was in-charge of an AI product which the company successfully launched later. I was later on given responsibilities of testing the products. I performed unit testing and QA. Furthermore, I successfully delivered software automations and web scraping in Python using Selenium. I also got my hands dirty with Data Analytics using Python with modules like Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib and Ngram. Last but not the least, on my journey in the company I developed a software using Python for HR management.

experience.title: Product Management
